 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָרַק‎</span>] **verb** ==scour, polish== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְרַק‎</span>; compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***scrape off wool*** from a skin); — 

**Qal** ***Imperative*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִרְקוּ הָֽרְמָחִים‎</span> [[Jer.46.4|Jer 46:4]] ***polish the lances! Passive participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָרוּק‎</span> [[2Chr.4.16|2Chr 4:16]] ***polished***, of bronze utensils of temple (= <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְמוֺרָט‎</span> [[1Kgs.7.45|1Kgs 7:45]]). **Hiph\`il** ***Imperfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חַמְרִיק‎</span> only [[Prov.20.30|Prov 20:30]] [[BDB#Kt|Kt]], figurative, in clause <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּרָ֑ע‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חַבֻּרוֺת פֶּצַע ת‎</span> ***blows that cut in, cleanse away evil*** (compare [[BDB#De|De]] [[BDB#Now|Now]] [[BDB#Wild|Wild]] [[BDB#VB|VB]]); [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּמְרוּק‎</span> i.e. (are) ***a cleaning***. ([[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">συναντᾷ κακοῖς</span>, whence [[BDB#Gr|Gr]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּקְדִּים‎</span>, [[BDB#Frankenb|Frankenb]]. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּקְרֶינָה‎</span>, but improbable). **Pu\`al** ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּמֹרַק‎</span> consecutive [[Lev.6.21|Lev 6:21]] ***be well scoured***, of bronze vessel (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְשֻׁטַּף בַּמָּ֑יִם‎</span>).
